DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this prospective randomized double-blind study was to compare the efficacy of new pharmaceutical composition containing botulinum toxin injection in epicardial fat pads for preventing recurrences of atrial tachyarrhythmia in patients with paroxysmal atrial fibrillation undergoing coronary artery bypass grafting.
DOC.brief_title: The New Pharmaceutical Composition Containing Botulinum Toxin to Treat Atrial Fibrillation
